text: Tansalile (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) akusigalila munyuma (pangalongana namwe wa ku Maaka) mu ŵarabu ŵanchimisi: “Yatuŵijikenye ipanje yetu kwisa soni maŵasa getu, basi tuŵendelani chikululuko (kwa Allah).” Akuŵecheta ni ndimi syao yanganiyiŵa m’mitima mwao. Jilani: “Ana ni nduni jwampaka akombole kunkamuchisya chilichose kwa Allah nasakaga kumpa masausyo kapena nasakaga kunkamuchisya? Nambo Allah aŵele Jwaasimanya chenene abali syosope sya yankutenda.”
